channel.title: Need help with vetern's crown :(
channel.description: Can someone help me out here? I have donater crown etc bu I want a crown for veterens. I already have the crown but I want to know how to put it beside there name whenever they talk etc. If someone can help me that would be great thanks.

item.title: Need help with vetern's crown :(
item.dc:creator: @Steve734 Steve734
item.description:
@Steve734 wrote:

Goto: Private Server Hacking>Tutorial List> Stewies Tutorial on how to add new crowns for new player rights.

Read full topic
